name: dumpily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an unpleasant or unattractive way, especially relating to a person who is short and wide: She was described as a dumpily unattractive woman. He was dumpily dressed in clothes that looked old and worn. Related word
dumpy
More examplesFewer examplesAlthough he was dumpily built, he was a great batsman.She had a thick neck, set dumpily on her white shoulders.He sat dumpily in his chair with his elbows on the table. She was standing dumpily in front of the fire. I didn't want to live in a dumpily decorated flat.
